full_summary:
# Mission Critical Team Training (MCTT)

## Tender Information

* **Tender Title:** Mission Critical Team Training
* **Contract Reference Number:** cb-549-52868082
* **Contract Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** W6399-24LO25/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-01-29
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-13 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-03-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2027-02-28
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **UNSPSC Code:** 86100000 (vocational training)
* **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Procurement Method:** Advance contract award notice
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Project Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Mission Critical Team Training (MCTT) to enhance the capabilities of Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) personnel. The objective is to develop highly cohesive and effective teams capable of making decisions in complex situations. This training is essential for immediate deployment across a range of conflicts.

## Business Requirements

### Key Deliverables

* The supplier must submit a Statement of Capability to the Procurement Officer.

### Additional Information

* Refer to the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) documents for further details.
* Canada reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Christopher Muldoon
* **Email:** christopher.muldoon@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 990-5234

## Attachments

* **French Notice:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30735/w6399_24_lo25_mctt_acan_fr.pdf
* **English Notice:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30735/w6399_24_lo25_mctt_acan.pdf
* **Installation Insert:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30740/mctt_productonteleshootingIns.pdf (Not accessible)

This rewritten version is more concise and focuses on the essential information. I have removed unnecessary details and reorganized the text to improve readability.
